channel.title: MerlinScape v2 - 508 HD: 2013
channel.description:
[center][img]http://camelot.net76.net/images/screens/logo.png[/img][/center] [b]Hello Moparscape![/b] Every year during the summer I will go on a runescape rampage, making websites for rsps' and rsps client and servers themselves. I've been getting pretty bored lately and have been wanting to start making another rsps. So i will finish an old project I had started with an old friend, called MerlinScape. Last year I had released a client called MerlinScape which was an HD 508 (Original Client & Server by DemonWars - Who is also the friend I am working with). This year I am going to fix all the bugs, glitches, errors and anything else I come across with. Hopefully if anybody would like to help, we can get this development underway! I probably will not host this server, unless I get alot of support. So i may put up a showoff website, but other then that, don't expect too much! The images I show you bellow are from my old MerlinScape, Mainly because i haven't done too much yet, I will show old pictures! Anyways, if you would like to help me with this project, I will be grateful for the support! [i]Thanks, James.[/i] [size=18pt]Images:[/size] [img]http://camelot.net76.net/images/screens/screenshot1.png[/img] [img]http://camelot.net76.net/images/screens/screenshot2.png[/img] [img]http://camelot.net76.net/images/screens/screenshot3.png[/img] [img]http://camelot.net76.net/images/screens/screenshot4.png[/img] [img]http://camelot.net76.net/images/screens/screenshot5.png[/img] [img]http://camelot.net76.net/images/screens/screenshot6.png[/img] [img]http://camelot.net76.net/images/screens/screenshot7.png[/img] [img]http://camelot.net76.net/images/screens/screenshot8.png[/img] [hr] [size=18pt]To-do List:[/size]
- Make Summoning - Make Construction - Fix Doors - Fix multiple NPC Glitches (They follow you, things like that) - Clean up client (edit client cache)
[size=18pt]Updates as of: [04/05/2013][/size]
[b][10/05/2013]:[/b] - Started Remaking Fletching (Old script was terrible) - Going to start adding Summoning (Bit by bit) - Random Mage Glitches (I messed something up) - Cleaning up more server files, Cleaned Login.java, frames.java, ActionButtons.java, - Creating an easy Script for Quests (Individual) - Currently Quest.java, QuestDevelopment.java, and QuestActions.java - Attempting to fix lags (Although it's probably just my computer) [b][07/05/2013]:[/b] - Attempting to fix the Teleport glitch for good. - Re-Organized Models and client files - Started created a website for MerlinScape Development. Should be ready next week. [b][05/05/2013]:[/b] - Temporary Fix on the Teleport Glitch/Bug - Cleaned up shop files - Cleaned up custom Quest Tab - Looking for other members to assist in the project! [b][04/05/2013]:[/b] - Added Help System, Jail System. - Changed the home - NPC vs NPC Combat (NPC's Attack each other) - High Definition Client - Organized Server and Client Files - Random Server Messages - Quest Tab Teleports - Most Combat skills are 10% - Mage is around 95% and Range is 76% - Fletching, Cooking and Fishing are 100% - Construction and any other skills are bellow 40% completion
[hr] [size=18pt]Looking for Assistance[/size] I am still looking for members to assist in the project. So far I have the following People. If you would like to assist me - add my skype (james-ve3xje) [ul][li]James (TehJamDude)[/li] [li]DemonWars[/li] [li]MezzyScape[/li][/ul] Link to the original Merlinscape 508: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,546382.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,546382.0.html[/url] Can't wait for the support! And again thanks Moparscape!

I support this. It looks to be an amazing project. Keep up the good work!

Thanks Mate. I’m hopeing that it turns out awesome

Soulcist:

Good luck with the development, and wish for the best.

Thank you, good luck with yours aswell.

item.title: MerlinScape v2 - 508 HD: 2013
item.dc:creator: @tehjamdude tehjamdude
item.description:
@tehjamdude wrote:

[center][/center]

Hello Moparscape!

Every year during the summer I will go on a runescape rampage, making websites for rsps’ and rsps client and servers themselves. I’ve been getting pretty bored lately and have been wanting to start making another rsps. So i will finish an old project I had started with an old friend, called MerlinScape. Last year I had released a client called MerlinScape which was an HD 508 (Original Client & Server by DemonWars - Who is also the friend I am working with). This year I am going to fix all the bugs, glitches, errors and anything else I come across with. Hopefully if anybody would like to help, we can get this development underway!

I probably will not host this server, unless I get alot of support. So i may put up a showoff website, but other then that, don’t expect too much!

The images I show you bellow are from my old MerlinScape, Mainly because i haven’t done too much yet, I will show old pictures!

Anyways, if you would like to help me with this project, I will be grateful for the support!

Thanks,
James.

[size=18pt]Images:[/size]








[hr]

[size=18pt]To-do List:[/size]

- Make Summoning - Make Construction - Fix Doors - Fix multiple NPC Glitches (They follow you, things like that) - Clean up client (edit client cache)

[size=18pt]Updates as of: [04/05/2013][/size]

[b][10/05/2013]:[/b] - Started Remaking Fletching (Old script was terrible) - Going to start adding Summoning (Bit by bit) - Random Mage Glitches (I messed something up) - Cleaning up more server files, Cleaned Login.java, frames.java, ActionButtons.java, - Creating an easy Script for Quests (Individual) - Currently Quest.java, QuestDevelopment.java, and QuestActions.java - Attempting to fix lags (Although it's probably just my computer)

[07/05/2013]:

  • Attempting to fix the Teleport glitch for good.
  • Re-Organized Models and client files
  • Started created a website for MerlinScape Development. Should be ready next week.

[05/05/2013]:

  • Temporary Fix on the Teleport Glitch/Bug
  • Cleaned up shop files
  • Cleaned up custom Quest Tab
  • Looking for other members to assist in the project!

[04/05/2013]:

  • Added Help System, Jail System.
  • Changed the home
  • NPC vs NPC Combat (NPC’s Attack each other)
  • High Definition Client
  • Organized Server and Client Files
  • Random Server Messages
  • Quest Tab Teleports
  • Most Combat skills are 10% - Mage is around 95% and Range is 76%
  • Fletching, Cooking and Fishing are 100%
  • Construction and any other skills are bellow 40% completion

[hr]

[size=18pt]Looking for Assistance[/size]
I am still looking for members to assist in the project. So far I have the following People. If you would like to assist me - add my skype (james-ve3xje)

[ul][li]James (TehJamDude)[/li]
[li]DemonWars[/li]
[li]MezzyScape[/li][/ul]

Link to the original Merlinscape 508: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,546382.0.html

Can’t wait for the support! And again thanks Moparscape!

Read full topic
